642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Location & Accessibility, Where is the hotel located?, In city center of Rabat at Avenue Chellah
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Location & Accessibility, Can I have the hotel location on Google Maps?, https://www.google.com/maps/dir/34.0196367,-6.8243916/tour+hassan+palace/@34.0194035,-6.832523,16z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m9!4m8!1m1!4e1!1m5!1m1!1s0xda76b8f50d0a30f:0x7c901812ad50ed31!2m2!1d-6.8303547!2d34.0194903?entry=ttu
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Location & Accessibility, What's the neighborhood like?, We have the best location and we are close to all the monuments
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Location & Accessibility, How far is the hotel from the city center?, We are in the city center
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Location & Accessibility, Are there any public transportation options?, There is tramway, taxi and bus
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Location & Accessibility, Do you offer airport shuttle service?, We do not offer airport shuttle service but we can organize a transfer with the hotel car
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Location & Accessibility, Can I arrange for a private transfer?, We can organize transportation with the hotel car
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Location & Accessibility, Is parking available at the hotel, and if so, is there a fee?, The parking is available with limited places for free
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Location & Accessibility, Are there electric vehicle charging stations?, There is no electric vehicle charging station
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Location & Accessibility, Are there subway or bus stops nearby?, There is a bus station and no subway station
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Check-in & Check-out, What is the check-in time?, The Check-in time is at 3.00pm
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Check-in & Check-out, What is the check-out time?, The Check-out time is at 12 O"clock
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Check-in & Check-out, Can I request an early check-in?, Yes , you can request an early check-in upon availibility
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Check-in & Check-out, How late can I check-out? Is there a fee for late check-out?, Before 6.00 we do charge 50% and up to 6.oo we charge the full night rate
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Check-in & Check-out, Can I store my luggage at the hotel before check-in or after check-out?, We do have a storage room if you want to keep your luggages in the hotel
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Check-in & Check-out, What documents are required at check-in?, Passeport, credit card and marriage certificate for muslums
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Room Information, Are the rooms equipped with air conditioning and heating?, Yes, we do have a central AC system
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Room Information, Are there any rooms with balconies?, No, we do not have balconies in rooms
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Room Information, Do you offer rooms with accessibility features for guests with disabilities?, Yes, we do have rooms with accessibility features for guests with disabilities
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Room Information, Are there ramps and elevators?, Yes, we do have ramps and elevators.

642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Room Information, What are the conditions for baby cots and extra beds?, under the age of 12 the kid is lodged for free in the romm of the parents,
regarding the extra bed it costs 500,00MAD
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Room Information, Do you provide baby crib bedding?, we do provide baby crib bedding,
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Room Information, What are the room amenities?, 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Room Information, What bathroom amenities are provided?, two soap bars, shampoo, conditionner,Shower gel, body lotion
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Room Information, Do you provide dental kits and shaving kits?, yes, on request
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Room Information, Do the rooms come with a minibar or refrigerator?, yes all the rooms are equipted with a mini bar
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Room Information, Are there tea and coffee making facilities in the rooms?, yes, all the rooms do have a Nespreso coffee machine,
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Room Information, Are there in-room safes for valuables?, yes, all the rooms are provided with safes for valuables
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Room Information, What entertainment facilities are available in the rooms?, TV and Radio channels
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Room Information, Do you have Smart TVs with streaming services?, yes, but on request
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Room Information, Can I connect my own devices to the TV?, yes, you can connect your devices to the TV
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Room Information, Are there charging ports in the rooms?, No,
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Information, What is the style of the hotel?, The hotel is Modern Contemporary
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Information, What type of breakfast does the hotel offer?, The hotel offers a daily buffet breakfast
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Information, What are the breakfast timings?, The breakfast starts from 6.30am to 10.30am
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Information, Is there a swimming pool?, We have an outdoor swimming pool
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Information, Is the pool heated?, The pool is not heated
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Information, Are there poolside services?, We do have poolside services
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Information, Is there a fitness center?, There is a fitness center in the hotel open from 9.00am to 9.00pm
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Information, What equipment is available in the gym?, 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Information, Are personal trainers available?, No
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Information, Is there a space where I can make videoconference meetings?, Yes, in the Business Center
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Information, Is there a quiet space for work?, Yes, in the Business Center
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Hotel Information, Can I use a printer?, Yes you can use a printer in the business center or at the reception
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Reservation, Can I modify or cancel my reservation after booking?, 72h prior arrival date
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Reservation, Are there special rates or discounts for children's stays?, 50% off
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Reservation, Are there age restrictions for children to stay at the hotel?, NO (under 3 yo free of charges)
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Reservation, Do you offer family-friendly room options?, We do have interconnecting rooms
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Payment and Policies, What payment methods do you accept?, Credit cards, cheque and cash
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Payment and Policies, Is a deposit required at the time of booking? If yes, How much is the deposit?, No, just the credit card details as a garantee of the booking
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Payment and Policies, What is your pet policy? Are there restrictions on pet size?, Pets are not allowed
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Payment and Policies, Do you have any specific policy?, 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Connectivity and Health, Is there Wi-Fi? How much does it cost?, Certainly! Wi-Fi is available at the hotel and it"s complimentary.
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Connectivity and Health, Is the Wi-Fi reliable for video calls?, Yes, the Wi-Fi is suitable for video calls
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Connectivity and Health, Can I stream movies with the Wi-Fi?, The Wi-Fi is sufficient for streaming your favorite movies.
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Connectivity and Health, Do you provide USB charging outlets?, No
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Connectivity and Health, Are there international plug adapters available?, Yes benefith the mirrors
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Connectivity and Health, Do you have hand sanitizing stations?, Yes 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Connectivity and Health, Are masks and gloves available?, Yes upon request
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Connectivity and Health, What health and safety measures are in place at the hotel?, Standard security measures are in place such as CCTV, metal detector ... 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Security and Additional Services, Do you have 24/7 security staff?, Yes
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Security and Additional Services, Are there security cameras on the premises?, Yes
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Security and Additional Services, Is there a keycard access system?, Yes
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Security and Additional Services, Are there play areas for children?, No
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Security and Additional Services, Do you have a babysitting service?, No
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Security and Additional Services, Can the hotel staff assist in arranging special events or surprises (like birthday celebrations or romantic dinners)?, Yes
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Security and Additional Services, Can I arrange for a romantic room setup?, Yes

id, name, service category, service name, type, description, opening_hours
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Restaurant, Takumi, Sushis, Cocktails, Sushi Bar, Welcome to "Takumi," a haven of culinary delights where Japanese tradition meets gastronomic innovation. Nestled in the heart of the city, our sushi bar invites you to an unparalleled sensory experience., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Restaurant, Ftour Ramadan, Ramada, Ftour, Indulge in an unforgettable ftour experience at La Maison Arabe, a premier Moroccan restaurant renowned for its rich buffet. As the evening call to prayer echoes, enjoy a variety of main dishes. La Maison Arabe promises an ambiance that weaves modern luxury with authentic Moroccan charm, ensuring your ftour is as visually stunning as it is delicious., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Rooms & Accommodation, Suite présidentielle, Suite, Eminently spacious, deliciously arranged, subtly decorated, equipped with a large bathroom of very high standard and high-end bedding, it was designed with infinite attention to detail and perfectly highlighted thanks to the presence of numerous works of art., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Rooms & Accommodation, Suite junior, Suite, Our Junior Suites, spacious, comfortable and modern, are designed to offer you a stay in the heart of refinement., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Request - Check In/Out, Check-in/Check-out, , Early check-in and late check-out are available upon request, subject to availability. Whether you want to settle in sooner or extend your stay, we’ll do our best to accommodate your needs., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Request - Concierge, Concierge, , Our concierge service is here to cater to your every need, from booking the perfect dinner spot to arranging transportation and securing tickets to events.

Let us make your stay memorable by personalizing your experience with us, 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Corporate Events, Meeting Rooms, Conference Room, Our versatile meeting spaces are ideal for both small conferences and meetings, with capacities ranging from 16 to 40 participants. Each room is equipped with modern amenities to facilitate productive and seamless discussions.	, 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Restaurant, L'épicurien, French, Discover the new Bistronomique menu of "L'épicurien" with a Michelin-starred chef in the kitchen. In a completely renovated setting, for lunch or dinner, enjoy a creative, punchy and comforting cuisine with a view of the Andalusian gardens and the pool., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Restaurant, La Maison Arabe, Moroccan, La Maison Arabe, the quintessential Moroccan restaurant. The best of what the country's gastronomy has to offer is concentrated here, a cuisine made with love and application, for your greatest delight: the real couscous, and its selected ingredients, the tagine in all its components and subtleties, the sweetness of a sweet final note. A gourmet delight, an unforgettable experience for the palate in a setting worthy of a Thousand and One Nights., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Request - Other, Other, , Our hotel’s concierge service is at your disposal for any additional needs during your stay. Just send us your request., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Lounge & Bar, Le Jazz Bar, Piano, Cocktail, Need a little freshness? Want to have a drink to talk business? The Piano Bar presents its best production: cocktails, natural fruit juices and all the talent of its bartender., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Corporate Events, Accomodation, , Planning a multi-day event? Provide your guests with luxurious accommodations in one of Rabat’s iconic hotels.

Choose from a variety of room and suite options designed for comfort and convenience., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Room Service, Room Service, , Our Room Service is available 24/7 to cater to your every need. Whether it's a late-night snack, a full-course meal, or special requests, our attentive staff will ensure your dining experience is perfect., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Spa & well-being, Fitness, , Near the swimming pool, a first-class fitness center is at your disposal, supervised by a team of professionals who will be available to help you and advise you if necessary., is intended to offer you the best in relaxation of body and mind., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Rooms & Accommodation, Chambre Deluxe, Room, Our Deluxe Rooms with deep colors and refined furniture, welcome you in a warm atmosphere and a harmonious balance., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Request - Housekeeping, Housekeeping, ,  , 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Corporate Events, Conference Rooms, Meeting Room, Host your conferences or seminars in our elegant rooms, “Le Corps Diplomatique” and “Salle Ambassadeur.” With a spacious 520m² area, “Le Corps Diplomatique” can comfortably accommodate up to 600 attendees. For moderate gatherings, the “Salle Ambassadeur,” spanning 288m², is perfect for up to 220 guests.	, 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Restaurant, L'impérial, Buffet, At "L'Imperial", morning, noon or night, discover our buffets and take a seat, under the glass roofs or on the terrace, in the shade of the Andalusian gardens. The cuisine is light or more sophisticated to suit your taste, and you can enjoy traditional or European-inspired dishes according to your choice., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Request - Transportation, Transportation, , We offer a convenient shuttle service to and from the airport, ensuring hassle-free transportation for our guests., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Rooms & Accommodation, Chambre supérieure, Room, The superior rooms have a generous space, with warm colors and contemporary furniture where everything has been designed for your comfort and to make your stay a pure moment of happiness. Viewing gardens or the city, the superior rooms will give you a unique experience., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Rooms & Accommodation, Suite royale, Suite, Our Royal Suites, luxuriously decorated, extend over a space of 265 square meters: high-end bedding, tapestries, contemporary furniture and works of art are waiting for you for a stay out of time., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Rooms & Accommodation, Suite prestige, Suite, The Prestige Suite, in a harmonious space, offers elegant decoration with a peaceful view of the Andalusian Gardens., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Corporate Events, Catering, Catering, Elevate your events with our exquisite catering services. Whether it’s a coffee break or a full-course lunch, guests will be delighted by our diverse menu featuring both international and traditional Moroccan cuisines., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Spa & well-being, Spa, , The luxurious Spa of the Hassan Palace Tower dedicated to beauty and well-being, conducive to calm and serenity, welcomes you to experience a true sensory journey. The SPA offers hammam, sauna, treatments, massages and a fitness room., 
642c7a5a-63af-4dc1-9d03-fc96c0e67f17, Tour Hassan Palace, Spa & well-being, Piscine, , A haven of peace in the center of the Capital!
Refinement down to the smallest detail, attentive and discreet service, decor with a subtle balance between modernity and tradition, all within the Arabo-Andalusian gardens surrounding the swimming pool.,
